data.title: Alargan International Real Estate (ARGAN) News
data.meta_description: Top and Latest News of Alargan International Real Estate - ARGAN (ARGAN) and all historical news - Mubasher Info
data.text:
Alargan posts higher profits in Q1

Kuwait-Mubasher: Alargan International Real Estate recorded a 34.4% growth in profits of the first quarter in 2016 as compared to the same period in 2015, the company said in a bourse filing issued Sunday. The earnings increased to about KWD …

Kuwait-Mubasher: Alargan International Real Estate will hold an ordinary general meeting on 23 May to discuss the board’s recommendation of distributing dividends for the fiscal year 2015, according to a bourse statement. The board has proposed a …
